Why CivicMaker?

CivicMaker is leading the industry in faster, safer, zero maintenance websites. We offer the features residents look for in responsive, user friendly sites. With the combined power of BowTie, you can rest easy knowing you are meeting the needs of your citizens.

Learn More

CivicMaker Brings
City Websites To Life

CivicMaker leverages the BowTie platform for a fully integrated website solution. City, County, and State governments benefit from a complete solution that brings citizens the best, user-friendly digital window into your government.

Learn More

Experience Matters

CivicMaker knows that experience matters. That is why we proudly feature a team with an average of over 10 years of professional experience for each member. We know local government. We take pride in civic work. We believe in better websites.

Learn More

Some important text here!

CivicMaker designers have built hundreds of websites and applications. The CivicMaker platform directly addresses the needs of dynamic and forward thinking local governments that know their citizens come first and a great website is their window to the community. CivicMaker custom websites drive knowledge sharing.
